body: Hi all. I need some information please. I'm trying to appeal a temp ban but was told by mod. supervisor that it is done in the forms now but I find no place to do it. There are a lot of comments saying to go to support but that is where I was told to go to forms ? can some one PLZ help me thru this. <:{
body_tagged: Hi all. I need some information please. I'm trying to appeal a temp ban but was told by mod. supervisor that it is done in the forms now but I find no place to do it. There are a lot of comments saying to go to support but that is where I was told to go to forms ? can some one PLZ help me thru this. <:{
title: help me PLZ

replies.body:
It's under the policy tab: Appeal an Infraction

EDIT: Make sure to read lord's guide on appealing an infraction, if you do not follow what it says on the guide, your appeal will mostly likely be denied and ignored.
replies.body_tagged:
It's under the policy tab: Appeal an Infraction

EDIT: Make sure to read lord's guide on appealing an infraction, if you do not follow what it says on the guide, your appeal will mostly likely be denied and ignored.

replies.body:
https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=50 here you go mate!
And read this: https://avicus.net/forums/4f955d6ab

But I won't apeal for a 3-day-infraction, just wait and don't break the rules again! You're not far away for a perm ban...

replies.body:
Click on this to create an appeal: https://avicus.net/forums/new?utf8=%E2%9C%93&topic_id=50

However, you have quite a lot of infractions, so it may not be very easy to appeal.
You should just wait for your 4 day tempban to expire, but you may appeal if you would like.

Good luck.
replies.body_tagged:
Click on this to create an appeal: https://avicus.net/forums/new?utf8=%E2%9C%93&topic_id=50

replies.body:
yes you may be right but getting wound up in a game and not realizing your cap lock is on is not really that big a deal is it ? I do not watch the chat that closely and don't notice the warnings all the time when I do I apologize. my bad.  I feel I was wrongly banned and think it should be looked into you have the right to disagree with me and I with you right. I like this server and play it a lot I just hope that it is being moderated fairly. And that it will continue to be.
GL HF (oh sorry caps) <:}
